description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
TASKS-33295 - Export to TaskUsage View returns NullReference exception
TASKS-33282 - Exception when change SaveOptions PresentationFormat
TASKS-22007 - [TaskLinks] Order of MPP TaskLinks is different from XML TaskLinks

Enhancements
TASKS-29117 - [Gantt chart image] ability to increase height of rows
TASKS-31093 - Read fixed cost values from MSP 2010 files

New Feature
TASKS-33289 – Write Outline codes and Extended attributes in 2013 MPP format
TASKS-33287 – Write Project’s Calendar data in MSP 2013 MPP format
TASKS-33284 – Write Project’s Task data in MSP 2013 MPP format
TASKS-33288 - Write Project’s Task Links data in MSP 2013 MPP format
TASKS-33285 - Write Project’s Resource data in MSP 2013 MPP format
TASKS-33286 - Write Project’s Resource Assignment data in MSP 2013 MPP format
TASKS-33157 - [Gantt Chart] Support pre-defined page sizes
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
